creator: European Union
descriptionHtml:
EPALE (Electronic Platform for Adult Learning in Europe) is a European, multilingual, open membership community of adult learning professionals, including adult educators and trainers, guidance and support staff, researchers and academics, and policymakers.

As a registered member of EPALE you can discuss ideas and share information with other people in your country or in Europe, working in your sector. The mobile app is the right tool for finding partners or sharing experiences and ideas related to your adult learning projects. You are also able to share events, resources, blog posts and articles (including policy documents and relevant materials produced by projects) with others throughout Europe.
To use the mobile app you need to have or to create an EPALE account or EU Login account.

Here’s an overview of the app’s structure!

Do you want to have a quick look at EPALE?

On the Homepage, you can check the latest updates or upcoming events.

Do you want to see the contribution of others?
Access the Contribution menu and there you can see insights and ideas from EPALE members, the latest development in Adult Learning. You can find resources related to specific themes or inspirational stories from the Community.
The events section provides information on adult learning events at European and national levels. These include conferences, seminars, workshops, contact seminars, general events, training courses, MOOCs and much more. You can search for events by language, location, date, type of event, related theme, and type of organiser.


Do you want to collaborate?
In the Collaborate menu, you can join public or private groups working on specific topics. Here you can find partners for national and EU projects or you can search for organisations
across Europe. Share your ideas and exchange good practice!

Do you want to find out what is EPALE?
Go to the About menu and there you can see the answers to all your questions about EPALE. There you can ask for support and advice to help you use EPALE.

Do you want to update your personal data?
Go to My Profile and update your personal information and preferences. You can quickly access everything on EPALE.

Please note that to run the app at full capacity, it is recommended that your device has a version of its operating system that is iOS 9.0.

Please note that to run the app at full capacity, it is recommended that your device has a version of its operating system that is Android SDK 21 - Android 4.0.
descriptionShort: EPALE is a European, open membership community of adult learning professionals
